description:
Hello Bristol Gophers 👋!

We're super excited to continue our series of Golang talks.

Speakers:

🗣️ Dafydd Thomas - TLS and SSH certificates in practice with go

Dafydd has been working on a project for the last year where he's needed to dynamically create SSH and TLS certificates. Dafydd used to think of TLS or any certificate based authentication as a black box of magic, but having some hands-on experience has made it less bewildering.

Dafydd is a senior software engineer at Grafana Labs. He has been working primarily in go for about five years. Outside of work, he spends his time running around the countryside with his dog, and raising his two year old child.

🗣️ TBC

⏰ Schedule (possibly):

* 18:00-18:15 welcome/pizza/intro
* 18:15-18:45 first speaker
* 18:45-18:50 small break
* 18:50-19:20 second speaker
* 19:15-19:30 farewell/next event info

❤️ Sponsors

* Tumelo (venue)
* Formula Recruitment (food/drinks)

📍 - Runway East
title: Golang Talks @ RWE
